metadata.title: CVE-2019-8427 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
daemonControl in includes/functions.php in ZoneMinder before 1.32.3 allowscommand injection via shell metacharacters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8427` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
